Plot: The sequel to the hit comedy American Pie (1999), the high school students are now in college. These close friends decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.
Title: American Pie 2
Writer: Adam Herz (characters), David H. Steinberg (story), Adam Herz (story), Adam Herz (screenplay)
Actors: Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Alyson Hannigan, Chris Klein
tomatoConsensus: Being a sequel, American Pie 2 doesn't retain the freshness of the original, nor is it as funny.
